ygData.subject: Re: House Ryal - Looking for New Adventurers
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, when when i get my tag, hopefully this sunday. Come to our weekly druken fest in the blind fish and we can induct you. Later Chris Remlin Ryal, Warlord
ygData.messageBody:
Well, when when i get my tag, hopefully this sunday.
Come to our weekly druken fest in the blind fish and we can induct you.

Later
Chris

Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
<Rallos Zek>

-----Original Message-----
From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
To: 'EQ_spell_research@onelist.com' <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 29, 1999 10:59 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_spell_research] House Ryal - Looking for New Adventurers


>From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
>
>Hello Lord Ryal. My name is Flarfian a level 16 (soon to be 17) dark elf
>necromancer. I would be a higher level but I am interested in other
>characters as well and so have a few medium level characters. I enjoy
>helping people out but am finding it harder to get my friends to play the
>same times as me so I'm having difficulty getting a good group together.
>Sure, I've found nice strangers but a good team I can count on would be
>nice.
>
>Sincerely,
>Shawn A.
>
>Flarfian, level 16 dark elf necromancer
>Darmok, level 15 troll shaman
>Bertt, level 12 barbarian warrior
>Azara, level 8 high elf enchanter (with 40+ skill in jewelcraft)
>Sentinall, level 9 dark elf wizard
>Lalali, level 9 human bard
>
>
>Additionally I got my wife to play (hehe this is a smart thing to do) and
>she is a level 16 rogue.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Remlin [mailto:remlin@...]
>Sent: Sunday, June 20, 1999 10:29 AM
>To: EverQuest Quest Mailing List; EQ Spell Research List
>Subject: [EQ_spell_research] House Ryal - Looking for New Adventurers
>
>
>To those of Evil Blood,
> House Ryal of Neriak is looking for new Adventurers to join its ranks.
>If you have reached the 5th level of training in your guild or are of close
>achievment, and have a heart pure of honor and courage, than write me with
>your interest of membership. For those of lower rank we wish to help you
>progress up into the higher levels quickly and we can help you achieve
this.
>
>
> Safe Travels Under the Harsh Sun
>
> Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
> <rallos zek>
>
>

Please keep the emails on topic. Offensive remarks will not be tolerated,
no warnings. Apologies will be considered, but repeat offenders will be
banned permanently.
